tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_scrutiny (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulator VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    approval_status BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Media_Companies (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    industry VARCHAR(100),
    headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
    revenue DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Advertising_Expenditures (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT NOT NULL,
    expenditure_date DATE,
    expenditure_amount DECIMAL,
    media_platform VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES Media_Companies (id)
);

CREATE TABLE Regulatory_Scrutiny (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT NOT NULL,
    scrutiny_date DATE,
    scrutiny_status VARCHAR(50),
    comments TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES Media_Companies (id)
);

CREATE TABLE Media_Platforms (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    platform_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    platform_type VARCHAR(50),
    country_of_operation VARCHAR(50),
    founding_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE advertising_campaign (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    company_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES media_company(company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE advertising_expenditure (
    expenditure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    expenditure_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    campaign_id INT,
    expenditure_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES advertising_campaign(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_agency (
    campaign_id INT,
    agency_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (campaign_id, agency_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES advertising_campaign(campaign_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES ad_agency(agency_id)
);
